headline: Fortive (FTV): Evaluating Valuation Following the Launch of Ground Fault Locator in Solar Market Expansion
summary: Fortive's latest move centers on the launch of the Fluke GFL-1500 Ground Fault Locator, a tool designed to make troubleshooting solar power systems much safer and faster for technicians. Investors are watching closely because this release could carve a stake for the company in the fast-growing solar maintenance market. See our latest analysis for Fortive. Momentum around Fortive has been mixed. While the launch of the Fluke GFL-1500 has drawn industry headlines, recent stock performance has...
